warmup.prompt: How do you say 'Good morning' in Portuguese?

feedback.correct: Nice. Bom dia is morning until lunch.
feedback.wrong: It is Bom dia. You will use it until lunchtime.

dialogue.speaker: G
dialogue.pt: Bom dia. Muito obrigada. Chamo-me Sarah.
dialogue.en: Good morning. Thank you very much. My name is Sarah.

dialogue.speaker: H
dialogue.en: Nice to meet you, Sarah. I am João.

dialogue.speaker: G
dialogue.pt: Prazer, João. É a minha primeira vez em Portugal.
dialogue.en: Nice to meet you, João. It is my first time in Portugal.

noticing.explain: '-me' means 'me'. Portuguese uses a reflexive form here.

microTask.prompt: Introduce yourself to your host. Say your name and where you are from.
microTask.example: Bom dia. Chamo-me Alex. Sou dos EUA.
